item.title: 深入理解 Kubernetes Scheduler Framework 调度框架（Part 1）
item.description: 调度器介绍 Kubernetes 官方对于 scheduler 调度器的解释如下所示： The Kubernetes scheduler is a control plane process which assigns Pods to Nodes. The scheduler determines which Nodes are valid placements for each Pod in the scheduling queue according to constraints and available resources.
